awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 6 nominations.

fullplot: The Stone family unites in common cause when their favorite son brings his uptight girlfriend home for the Christmas holiday, with plans of proposing. Overwhelmed by the hostile reception, she begs her sister to join her for emotional support, triggering further complications.
plot: An uptight, conservative, businesswoman accompanies her boyfriend to his eccentric and outgoing family's annual Christmas celebration and finds that she's a fish out of water in their free-spirited way of life.
title: The Family Stone

tomatoes.consensus: This family holiday dramedy features fine performances but awkward shifts of tone.
